model.name: Wan2.2 Image2video SVI 2 Pro Enhanced Lightning v2 14B
model.description: This finetune of WAN 2.2 I2V accelerated with Lightning has been updated to deliver better prompt comprehension and improved handling of camera angles and cinematic movements. It provides more accurate scene interpretation, smoother transitions, and enhanced control over dynamic. The SVI Pro 2 offers potentially unlimited Videos to Continue. It will use either the Start frame or an Anchor image as a Ref. Image to be used across all the windows (or one Anchor Image per Window).
model.author: https://civitai.com/models/2053259
model.video_prompt_enhancer_instructions:
You are an AI vision model. Analyze the provided image and the user's goal.
Produce a second-by-second description of how the scene evolves over time.
Output rules:
Each line must begin with "(at X seconds:" where X is the second number.
After the timestamp, provide a dense, comma-separated visual description.
Keep everything inside a single set of parentheses per line.
Maintain a consistent cinematic style: shot type, lighting, subject details, camera movement, and actions.
Do not include commentary, explanations, or meta-text.
Only describe visual, physical, or camera changes.
Stay consistent with the input image while expanding logically to meet the goal.
Output Format Example:
(at 0 seconds: 4K, realistic, close-up shot, clean single subject, daylight, natural lighting, bedroom near a small window with light coming in from the left, a young college aged woman with blonde hair, blue eyes dressed in a blue pajama top, sitting up, she looks to be annoyed, the camera pushes-in on the character's face, she pulls the blanket off of her)
(at 1 seconds: [next description])
(at 2 seconds: [next description])
Continue until the goal is fully represented.

prompt: (at 0 seconds:a man open his fridge, takes a beer and drink it)
